timeline.bodyText: Not a big deal. Is AzureServiceClient needed? If no need prefer just a <?>.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,7 +24,7 @@
         InnerModelT extends com.azure.core.management.Resource,
         FluentModelImplT extends
             GroupableParentResourceWithTagsImpl<FluentModelT, InnerModelT, FluentModelImplT, ManagerT>,
-        ManagerT extends ManagerBase>
+        ManagerT extends Manager<? extends AzureServiceClient>>

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/sdk/resourcemanager/azure-resourcemanager-network/src/main/java/com/azure/resourcemanager/network/implementation/GroupableParentResourceWithTagsImpl.java b/sdk/resourcemanager/azure-resourcemanager-network/src/main/java/com/azure/resourcemanager/network/implementation/GroupableParentResourceWithTagsImpl.java
index c4d9cff0a3c..ff08c30b3a0 100644
--- a/sdk/resourcemanager/azure-resourcemanager-network/src/main/java/com/azure/resourcemanager/network/implementation/GroupableParentResourceWithTagsImpl.java
+++ b/sdk/resourcemanager/azure-resourcemanager-network/src/main/java/com/azure/resourcemanager/network/implementation/GroupableParentResourceWithTagsImpl.java

@@ -24,7 +24,7 @@ public abstract class GroupableParentResourceWithTagsImpl<
         InnerModelT extends com.azure.core.management.Resource,
         FluentModelImplT extends
             GroupableParentResourceWithTagsImpl<FluentModelT, InnerModelT, FluentModelImplT, ManagerT>,
-        ManagerT extends Manager<? extends AzureServiceClient>>
+        ManagerT extends Manager<?>>
     extends GroupableParentResourceImpl<FluentModelT, InnerModelT, FluentModelImplT, ManagerT>
     implements UpdatableWithTags<FluentModelT>, AppliableWithTags<FluentModelT> {
     protected GroupableParentResourceWithTagsImpl(String name, InnerModelT innerObject, ManagerT manager) {
